content.rendered:
After 90 days at Givenchy, creative director Matthew Williams debuted his first collection for the house in one of Pariss most anticipated presentations of the Spring/Summer 2021 season.

Known for his penchant for hardware as seen at his 1017 Alyx 19SM label, Williamsincorporated chains, metal, and shine into many of the collections bags, shoes, and outerwear.

In 54 looks, he created something for everyone, whether the Givenchy customer wants an impeccably tailored suit or a sexy dress for a scantily-clad night on the town.

Watch the Givenchy PFW SS21 Show
